custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) total FROM OEP_PROCESSMGT_PROCESSORDER INNER JOIN OEP_PROCESSMGT_STEPTRANSITION ON OEP_PROCESSMGT_PROCESSORDER.DOSSIERSTEPID = OEP_PROCESSMGT_STEPTRANSITION.PREDOSSIERSTEPID WHERE OEP_PROCESSMGT_STEPTRANSITION.AUTOCONDITION = OEP_PROCESSMGT_PROCESSORDER.CURRENTCONDITON [$COMPANY_FILTER$]

SELECT * FROM OEP_PROCESSMGT_PROCESSORDER INNER JOIN OEP_PROCESSMGT_STEPTRANSITION ON OEP_PROCESSMGT_PROCESSORDER.DOSSIERSTEPID = OEP_PROCESSMGT_STEPTRANSITION.PREDOSSIERSTEPID WHERE OEP_PROCESSMGT_STEPTRANSITION.AUTOCONDITION = OEP_PROCESSMGT_PROCESSORDER.CURRENTCONDITON [$COMPANY_FILTER$]

SELECT COUNT(*) total FROM OEP_PROCESSMGT_PROCESSORDER LEFT JOIN OEP_PROCESSMGT_PROCESSORDER2USER ON OEP_PROCESSMGT_PROCESSORDER.PROCESSORDERID = OEP_PROCESSMGT_PROCESSORDER2USER.PROCESSORDERID WHERE 1=1 [$ASSIGN_USER$] [$COMPANY_FILTER$]

SELECT * FROM OEP_PROCESSMGT_PROCESSORDER LEFT JOIN OEP_PROCESSMGT_PROCESSORDER2USER ON OEP_PROCESSMGT_PROCESSORDER.PROCESSORDERID = OEP_PROCESSMGT_PROCESSORDER2USER.PROCESSORDERID WHERE 1=1 [$ASSIGN_USER$] [$COMPANY_FILTER$]
